title: Soma (Steam-Rip) [Multi7] (1.10) [2015]
description:
Year: 22 September 2015
Genre: Action, Survival Horror
Developer: Frictional Games
Publisher: Frictional Games
Game Version: 1.10 December 15
Publication Type: Steam Rip
Language: Russian, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese
Language: English
Tablet: Present (DRM-Free | 3DM | ALI213)

SOMA - it's a sci-fi horror movie from the studio Frictional Games, creators of the game "Amnesia: The ghost of the past." You will find a scary story, which sets tough questions - what is consciousness, identity and what it means to be human. Radio silence, food is running out, and people imagined themselves to robots. Traveling on the underwater station "Paphos II", which has long been completely cut off from the outside world, you have to make difficult decisions. What can be done? What else matters? It remains whether something makes sense for that fight? Immerse yourself in SOMA and look in the face of horrors, tayaschimsya in the depths of the ocean. Learn recording blocked terminals and read secret documents to find out what secrets are hidden behind the veil of chaos around you
